il.ac.telhai.coupons.model

Class CouponTxTemplate<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • il.ac.telhai.coupons.model.CouponTxTemplate<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The coupon transaction return value (ie Coupon object, integer, etc).
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    CouponTx<T>

    public abstract class CouponTxTemplate<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements CouponTx<T>
    An abstract class that defines a coupon transaction with the template method design pattern. We use this design pattern since transactions are mostly made up of common steps.
    Author:
    Nahum and Eyal
    See Also:
    CouponTx

    • Method Detail

      • execute

        public final T execute()
                throws CouponException
        A template method that executes the coupon transaction. An execution has the following steps:

        1) Open a session 2) Begin the transaction 3) Perform the database actions (with dbActions) 4) Commit the transaction

        If an error occurs in one of these steps, raise a CouponException with txError.

        Specified by:
        execute in interface CouponTx<T>
        Returns:
        The transaction's result.
        Throws:
        CouponException

      • close

        public void close()
        Close the session.

                     throws org.hibernate.HibernateException
